references.reason: This foundational paper introduces dynamic programming, a core concept in reinforcement learning that the current paper builds upon.
OpenAI Gym is a widely used benchmark for reinforcement learning algorithms, and the current paper utilizes it to evaluate the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Soft actor-critic: Off-policy maximum entropy deep reinforcement learning with a stochastic actor
references.reason: Soft Actor-Critic (SAC) is the reinforcement learning algorithm used in the current work, making this paper foundational to the presented methodology.
This book is a comprehensive introduction to reinforcement learning, providing the theoretical background and foundational knowledge necessary to understand the current paper.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This highly influential paper demonstrates the power of deep reinforcement learning in achieving human-level performance in complex games, inspiring much of the subsequent work in the field, including the current research.
